alert.note: Alert for Mahaska (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:26AM CDT until July 17 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mahaska County in south central Iowa... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 825 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beacon, or near Oskaloosa, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Oskaloosa, Fremont, Beacon, University Park, Rose Hill, Leighton, Keomah Village, Lake Keomah State Park and Oskaloosa Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
